SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player
public class Player extends Object
This class represents the Player registered in the lobby when at the start of the {code Game}. It provides methods to be used by the players to interact with the board and their bookshelves. It also links the player's with its objectives using a list of ScoreTiles and one providing access to the player's personal and common goals.
See Also:
  • Game
  • Tile
  • ScoreTile
  • PersonalGoal
  • CommonGoal
